War Games, from laptop to real life: Making the Cyber World a Safer Place
War Games, from laptop to real life:
Making the Cyber World a Safer Place

COL Curtis A. Carver Jr. Associate Dean, Information and Educational Technology
COL Curtis A. Carver Jr.

Educational Technology

What to Take from this Presentation
What to Take from this Presentation

• The situation is getting worst.

The Situation is Getting Worst
The Situation is Getting Worst

• Increasing number of attacks
• Increasing number of attacks

• Increasing complexity of attacks
• Increasing complexity of attacks

• Decreasing interval between patch release

and attack exploitation

Increasing Attacks
Increasing Attacks

This is about the point that Bloodhound.Exploit.45 attacked my computer.
This is about the point that
Bloodhound.Exploit.45
attacked my computer.

How could I be Attacked!
How could I be Attacked!

• Antivirus on perimeter. • Antivirus updates 14 times a day. • Anti-spam updated automatically. • Windows patches update automatically. • Firewalls on computer and on perimeter. • Was working over an encrypted VPN
• Antivirus on perimeter.
• Antivirus updates 14 times a day.
• Anti-spam updated automatically.
• Windows patches update automatically.
• Firewalls on computer and on perimeter.
• Was working over an encrypted VPN

channel.
channel.

Perimeter Defenses are not Working (Necessary but not Sufficient)
Perimeter Defenses are not Working
(Necessary but not Sufficient)

• Anti-virus, anti-spam, firewall, intrusion detection, and intrusion prevention systems are all necessary but not sufficient.
• Anti-virus, anti-spam, firewall, intrusion
detection, and intrusion prevention
systems are all necessary but not
sufficient.

My Projector is attacking my network!
My Projector is attacking
my network!

• Why?
• Why?

– Mobile worker population is out there working
– Mobile worker population is out there working

hard to pick up new and exotic attacks. – Insider threat much greater than outside
hard to pick up new and exotic attacks.
– Insider threat much greater than outside

threat.
threat.

– New computing devices are coming in all
– New computing devices are coming in all

shapes and sizes.
shapes and sizes.

Centralized Management is not Working (Necessary but not Sufficient)
Centralized Management is not Working
(Necessary but not Sufficient)

• Anti-virus and software update servers are
• Anti-virus and software update servers are

necessary but not sufficient. Active directory helps with authentication and authorization but is not enough.
necessary but not sufficient. Active directory
helps with authentication and authorization but is
not enough.

• Why?
• Why?

– Mobile work force – Time between release of patch and release of an attack tool, “flash to bang”, is rapidly shrinking.
– Mobile work force
– Time between release of patch and release of an
attack tool, “flash to bang”, is rapidly shrinking.

– As you hardened the perimeter and central
